name: Ynara Belle
text:
The guys working were patient, courteous and helpful....it had been a long time since we have had PM. They made the pizzas quick!
There's a chalkboard with daily specials, 1 is a really generous military …More

name: Abby Harris
text: Very friendly and helpful employees.the pizza tasted great, and had fresh ingredients. I usually get one of their delicious salads, and enjoy it every time. I definitely recommend getting pizza from here because you can bake it yourself so …More

name: Rack Back
text: This place is great. The employees are friendly, efficient, and knowledgeable. My niece has a gluten allergy, and they have gluten free crust! The ingredients are fresh too. A+ rating from me!

name: Allison Kuhn
text: The guys working tonight were fabulous. Their topping suggestions were spot on. The pizzas were delicious!

name: Annie Davis
text: After losing my dad less than a month agoago, I decided not to do a traditional thanksgiving this year... I went to your store yesterday and picked up a pizza for tonight, it was one of the best pizzas ever. Thank you

name: Cash Cole
text: Great food. Friendly service. Best pizza In town by far. Love the fact you can watch them make the pizza. Always fresh best pizza dough in town.

name: Janell Williams
text: Fast service! The guy's working there are super sweet! Pizza is the bomb!!

name: Rob Thome
text: Very clean and very customer friendly... Had a great experience and my kids just love the pizza from here... Definitely recommend this location to all my family and friends

name: Urumus
text: Literally the best pizza you'll ever find! They give a variety of toppings that YOU choose! Very delicious after being baked especially, as the crust is perfect, and it tastes really great hot, or cold!

name: Michael Bowen
text: I got the Valentine special two pepperoni pizzas was there really impressed with the crust but that's it sorry Papa John I guess I'm not your type of customer

name: Maria Manues
text: Yum!!! Good food. Fresh. Kind staff. Clean as well.

name: Kelly Powers
text: I tried the NY style pizza, and it was really good. Some thin crusts are so brittle I feel like I'm eating pizza on a cracker. This crust was very thin, but it was still "foldable" and delicious!

name: Michael Thornton
text: I hadn't ate at a Papa Murphy's in years, before getting pizza tonight from this Papa Murphy's. The staff was very nice and the pizza and cheese bread was amazing. Definitely recommend buying Pizza at this restaurant if you're near this place and looking for something to eat for the night!

name: Heather Young
text: Last time we went here the best thing I could say about the place is the employees were friendly. That is the only reason I gave this place 2 stars. Place was dirty. Line was a mess. Pizza was made very sloppy and did not cook evenly. Wont …More

name: Michelle Whitman
text: Paid $17.00 for a "5 meat Stuffed Pizza" - got a medium pepperoni.  They don't mark "gluten free" on a gluten free pizza, and since what i ordered was not what i got home with, I called to ask which one it might possibly be - I was told …More

name: Wyatt Rice
text: AMAZING food. So glad they CLOSE at 8 on THURSDAY'S. That Wyatt guy in the black shirt is a huge reason I always go back. His hair is amazing and he's always nice and Make's the best pizza's in the entire world. Not much else to say. Once again I repeat SO glad we close at 8 on THURSDAY'S.

name: Chandra Goodson
text: Love their $10 Tuesday deal! It's so easy to stop by and get dinner on the way home from work.

name: Bill Barber
text: Best pizza around and best value

name: Clyde Lape
text: We love Papa Murphy's pizza, but this location is a joke, Their pizza is pathetic. Do yourself a favor and drive across town to the other Papa Murphy's. Much, much better pizza quality. Last time I will ever visit this location.

name: Craig Clark
text: Pizza is always great and made the way I want. Extremely happy to see they support military and veterans.

name: James Sherbon
text: I like Papa Murphy's pizza. It is good quality and pretty well priced. The only thing I don't like is having to cook it myself. The prices are comparable to other pizza places that cook the pizza for you. If you want more control over your pizza, then Papa Murphy's is for you. If you don't want to cook , order elsewhere.

name: ronnie kessler
text: Quick friendly service, good pizza.

name: Larry Rogers
text: Friendly staff, fresh ingredients, hands-on management that I know wants me to leave happy.  If I have a problem, I let them know.  They've never failed to address a concern without my satisfaction.  If all I did was get mad and post a …More

name: BigMomma
text: Great crew of people there and good take n bake pizza

name: Carol Johnson
text: We love their pizzas.  Don't understand why they don't get threthe e pizza they ordered.  In store you watch as they build it.  Picking up,  why not look at it?

name: Cody Hinds
text: They have the best customer service and the most amazing food. Ever since the new management has taken over this location it's better than its has ever been. Thank you!!!

name: Terri Ruppert
text: Good take and bake pizza. Quick turn around.

name: Ruthann Edwards
text: Very cute jack-o-lantern pizza.

name: Rebecca Barnhart
text: Best pizza ever!!!! Clean and friendly knowledgeable staff nothing but great things to say. My family and friends all love this place!!!!

name: Carol Williams
text: Great staff, very friendly and the pizza is very good!

name: Tonya Hauser
text: i always have a complicated order and the guys always get it right and have fun while making it. Highly recommend this location.

name: Robert Sanders
text: Amazing food. Huge quantities for decent price.

name: Ryan Hopkins
text: Can't even pizza right. Called in to Order a hamburger pizza that was going to take 10 mins. I requested 2 large hamburger pizzas and the employee had to ask what I wanted on the pizza...ummm hamburger? 30 minutes later I walked out with 2 …More

name: Blake Rhodes
text: amazing staff and amazing pizza. so glad they close at 8 on thursdays.

name: Kay Love
text: I love that they make it right in front of u .but I wish that they deliver

name: Chantel Jones
text: Five minutes for employee to acknowledge I was there. Then  extremely rude , asked for have no cheese and cheese was all over the pizza.

name: Albert Tran
text: Got there and the place was closed permanently

name: stewart maxey
text: The store is locked and empty.

name: Jaclyn M.
text: Super friendly staff, awesome pizza. Weekly specials, just call and ask!

name: 405 guy
text: Love it  great price

name: Paula Harmon
text: best pizza in town

name: A
text: Great staff and service, clean store

name: Dawn Taylor- Kelley
text: First time there loved it

name: Susan Barber
text: My favorite pizza!

name: Dianna Morris
text: A little expensive.

name: Rose Aaron
text: Great pizza!

name: Albert Clark
text: Great toppings fresh cooks quick

name: Jas M
text: I love Papa Murphy's pizza, but this particular location has screwed up so many orders that I don't even go here anymore.  4 stars for the pizza, 1 star for this location.

name: Even Wagner
text: Pizza is always good!
